```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tmap)
library(geojsonio)
library(plotly)
library(rgdal)
library(broom)
library(mapview)
library(crosstalk)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(spdep)
library(car)
library(fs)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
LonwardData <- read_csv(here::here("london-ward-well-being-data.csv"), 
                               col_names = TRUE, 
                               locale = locale(encoding = 'Latin1'))
```


```{r}
position <- c(1:10)
Regressiondata<- LonwardData%>%
  clean_names()%>%
dplyr::select(position)

model <- lm(life_expectancy~ ., data = Regressiondata)

#show the summary of those outputs
tidy(model)
```

```{r}
glance(model)
```
```{r}
vif(model)
```

```{r}
summary(model)
```
